channel.title: How did u find out?
channel.description:
[center]welcome[/center]
[center]i am here to day to ask u how u found out about moparscape[/center]
[center]please just use the poll and post a nice feed back[/center]
[center]there is no flamming,spamming,etc any of that will go to a mod [/center]
[center]please just keep this forms/topic a nice safe clean please [/center]
[center]please keep this post alive but posting feed back ty[/center]
[center]ty[/center] [center]~alex4ever[/center]

item.title: How did u find out?
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

[quote=“Tech Scape, post:1, topic:108698”]me and a friend playing legion scape by screwy i was an admin =\

But, now that my main account (pimping one) is ban i dont really have a choice but to leave :([/quote]iv herd your main account is ban there is notting i can do about it talk to a g mod or something

Read full topic

@zoltanman wrote:

item.title: How did u find out?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“alex4ever, post:32, topic:107559”][quote author=Kmb link=topic=153968.msg1462349#msg1462349 date=1181503328]
I believe I was browsing the kaitnieks forums, and suddenly found a private server client called MoparScape, made by moparisthebest. That’s how I found MoparScape.

About these forums, I believe Mopar asked me to join on irc.
[/quote]lol irc wont work for me idk why i did what it said to do but wont work =([/quote]

probably didn’t follow the directions properly. Or maybe skipped a part.

Read full topic

item.title: How did u find out?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I Googled runescape cheating and stumbles across Kaitnieks where I discovered Aryan. Stayed there until it got shut and went to Autoruneltd.co.uk for a bit. Saw someone talking about Mopar and joined.

Read full topic

item.title: How did u find out?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I was all legit and innocent (with the occasional search for “teh hawt ub3r r00nscpr che4tss!!!111!!”)

Then i came across some runescape screen shot editing website and there was this one edit that was from far away but someone said “you can just do that with moparscape” so i searched around (took ages cos this site wasn’t as known and wasn’t at the top of the google results) and i found it. Then i got into moparscape, found it fun for about a week then i moved onto SCAR, found that more fun for about a month and made some scripts i was quite proud off. But now i just love MITB for its good and funny members (although I’m not too sure about the rest of them) and the fact that it got me serious about web design.

Read full topic

item.title: How did u find out?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

jme_009:

Well kaitnieks forums closed, autorune was obviously a scam and the community was even worse then what it’s like here sometimes, plus saradomin.net was obviously not going to go anywhere once abyssal left and if I remember correctly mopar told me to join here in the irc.

Same thing tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: How did u find out?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:1, topic:107712”]I remember wanting to get on these servers where you could"spawn items"
I always thought it was moperscape:p
Till one day I Watched a rs music video of"Until I Got High" and people called it mopar, then I searched and found myself here:O[/quote] Rofl, I saw that video, the one with the frogs?

And wait… Mopar? Not moparscape?

Read full topic
